DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects include 55 85 year age ; diagnose first unilateral ischemic brain injury intracerebral hemorrhage magnetic resonance imaging compute tomography within previous 1 6 year ; discharge rehabilitation service least 6 month program begin ; able work independently least 10 meter without assistive device ; low balance selfefficacy ( The Activitiesspecific Balance Confidence scale score < 80 ) ; able score > 7 10 Chinese version Abbreviated Mental Test ; able follow instruction provide write informed consent .
